_header: Now ye all be glad and blithe
Subjects: Christ, attributes of; dialogues, Christ and man
_description: Christ comes as a Champion — ten lines

BLHar7322.Transcription:
Nou ȝe alle beo glad and bliþeffor icome to leden on
                    swiþeho art þou þat comest so liteland so
                    mithfullho art þou þat comest so dredfuland so
                    Rithfulho art þou þat comest so ȝongeand so
                    connyngeho art þou þat comest so poreAnd al
                    weldynge
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
EETS
         o.s. 15 (1866); repr. 1962; rev. ed. 1903: 225; rev. ed. 254.
